Test Case Change Classification.Acceptance Criteria - Modified Content: Validate repository visibility settings (Public/Private) are applied correctly during creation and reflect the selected option post-creation.

Test Case Impact Details.Affected Test Case Name: Validate repository visibility is correctly set and reflected after creation

New Modified Test Case Steps.Step_Desc: Login to GitHub with valid credentials.

New Modified Test Case Steps.Expected_Result: 'Create a new repository' page is displayed.

New Modified Test Case Steps.Step_Desc: Enter repository name, description, and select visibility as Public.
New Modified Test Case Steps.Expected_Result: Repository details are entered with visibility set to Public.

New Modified Test Case Steps.Step_Desc: Verify that the created repository is visible to the public and the visibility setting is displayed as Public.
New Modified Test Case Steps.Expected_Result: Repository is accessible publicly and visibility is shown as Public.

New Modified Test Case Steps.Step_Desc: Repeat steps 2-5 with visibility set to Private.
New Modified Test Case Steps.Expected_Result: Repository is accessible only to the owner/collaborators and visibility is shown as Private.

Test Case Impact Details.New Modified Expected Results: Repository visibility is correctly set and reflected as per the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.
Test Case Impact Details.What changed in Test Cases Steps & Expec: New test case added to validate that repository visibility (Public/Private) is correctly applied during creation and reflected post-creation.
